instructions: Open the Google Hangouts app and tap the plus sign . Choose the contacts you want to invite to your Hangout. If you have your contacts sorted into groups, you can choose a group. In the screen that opens, tap the video icon at the top of the screen to initiate a one-to-one or group video call. Or, tap the phone receiver icon to begin a voice call. Send messages from the bottom of the screen. Use emojis in much the same way as you would with any texting app. Messages are sent and received instantly, in real time, between two users or among a whole group.
